docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Nov. 15-- Thirty-eight nations have rallied in support of the United Nations war against the North Korean Communist invaders with specific pledges of military and economic assistance, and unofficial tallies made today indicate that...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Nov. 15-- Thirty-eight nations have rallied in support of the United Nations war against the North Korean Communist invaders with specific pledges of military and economic assistance, and unofficial tallies made today indicate that ground, air and naval units of fifteen countries now are in action in Korea or en route.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Nov. 18--The United Nations today made public an official listing of military and economic aid offered for the war in Korea. Thirty-nine countries and six organizations have come forward with contributions.

docs.snippet: LA PLATA, Argentina, Nov. 18 --Dr. Ricardo Balbin, Argentina's No. 1 political prisoner, who this week faces a sentence of up to twelve years for "desacato," or disrespect of President Juan D. Peron, said in Olmos Prison here today that he stood...
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PLATA, Argentina, Nov. 18 --Dr. Ricardo Balbin, Argentina's No. 1 political prisoner, who this week faces a sentence of up to twelve years for "desacato," or disrespect of President Juan D. Peron, said in Olmos Prison here today that he stood firmly by everything he had said and would repeat it if freed tomorrow.
docs.abstract: Dr R Balbin, imprisoned since Mar, faces possible 12-yr term for 'disrespect' toward Peron; Amb Griffis sympathy noted; Balbin int; prestige cited
